Package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation

Class BuiltInAccelerometerSim

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.BuiltInAccelerometerSim
public class BuiltInAccelerometerSim extends Object
Class to control a simulated built-in accelerometer.

      public CallbackStore registerActiveCallback(NotifyCallback callback, boolean initialNotify)

      initialNotify - whether to run the callback with the initial state
      Returns:
      the CallbackStore object associated with this callback.
